sentence: Orchard Road and all its miles of shopping malls is a mere 10 minute walk away or one can take the shuttle bus that runs frequently from the Shangri La
You have to spend a minimum of half an hour wandering dazedly through a labyrinth of malls to buy anything at all
Be aware too that Orchard Road has been hopelessly mall ified it is utterly impossible to find a small store like a 71 normally rampant in Asia for small purchases
I was there on the 1st day of the Chinese New Year and they even invited all the guests for the Lion and Dragon dance performance
Overall I found price performance to be average considering the premium price range
We even had a woman playing the harp for us during breakfastWe had lunch and dinner at the hotel and the price tag was not price performance
You can ask for DVDs for in room entertainment
One visiting Singapore should for sure come to this hotel only because their is Orchard Road which has best of the food malls shopping experiences etc
The only downside for me was that I needed a taxi all the time to get to places as it is not walking distance from shops and entertainment
They are polite and attentive and great with suggestions when asked for where to find things in store or malls which restaurants to try events or activities to in which to take part
You can also reach shopping malls at Orchard Road
Just in a walking distance to famous shopping malls
The hotel is located is near to shopping mall
We were impressed with the Lion Dancing arrangements for Chinese New Year although it did mean the hotel was very busy
Very Convenient location for tours and about an 8 min shuttle ride to the ultra expensive Japanese mall on Orchard Rd
this was indeed a 5 star hotel conveniently located near copious shopping malls on Orchard
the team just did that when we went to Singapore for our Annual Meet for Top Performers
Amazing stay and food everywhere Patrick Pan at the breakfast was super nice and entertaining and everyone else was super nice also
Stuffs are very friendly especial thanks to Sanjoy for his entertainment us
